channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Content Navigator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Content Navigator

item.title: CVE-2019-4679|2024-09-17T03:02:23.293Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0CD could allow an authenticated user to gain information about the hosting operating system and version that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 171515.

item.title: CVE-2019-4741|2024-09-17T00:56:22.411Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0CD is vulnerable to Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF). This may allow an unauthenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 172815.

item.title: CVE-2021-20549|2024-09-17T04:04:42.042Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0.CD is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199167.

item.title: CVE-2019-4033|2024-09-17T04:14:34.790Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 2.0.3 and 3.0CD is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155999.

item.title: CVE-2017-1331|2024-09-17T02:16:50.864Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 2.0.3 and 3.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 126233.

item.title: CVE-2019-4034|2024-09-17T01:35:53.569Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0CD is could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a user's workstation. When editing an executable file in ICN with Edit service, it will be executed on the user's workstation. IBM X-Force ID: 156000.

item.title: CVE-2019-4263|2024-09-17T00:36:38.186Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 3.0CD is vulnerable to local file inclusion, allowing an attacker to access a configuration file in the ICN server. IBM X-Force ID: 160015.
